backend/main.mo: Initializes access control state and includes authorization mixin, exposing no additional functionality.
backend/migration.mo: Defines old/new actor data types and provides a no-op migration function returning an empty state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains textual summaries for all frontend files after the static-site conversion and UI updates.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining color tokens, light/dark theme variables, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: Static HTML entry point setting SEO metadata and loading the static React app via main.static.tsx.
frontend/public/_redirects: Netlify SPA redirect rule routing all paths to index.html with status 200.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes for Home, About, Solutions, and Contact using a shared layout.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactF: Frontend-only contact form with client-side validation, simulated submission delay, and success/error UI messaging.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroCarouse: Autoplaying, draggable hero image carousel with reduced-motion support and updated slide set.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Renders the site footer with company branding, navigation links, and a copyright notice. Includes a styled layout and external link attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Provides a responsive site header with branding, desktop navigation, and a mobile slide-out menu. Highlights active routes using router state.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Wraps all pages with a shared header, footer, and main content outlet. Defines the overall page structure.
frontend/src/components/motion/RevealOnS: Animates child content into view when scrolled into the viewport using IntersectionObserver. Supports reduced-motion preferences and optional delay.
frontend/src/components/services/Service: Displays a clickable service card with icon, title, description, and a hover animation. Supports keyboard interaction via Enter/Space.
Shows a modal with detailed service information including features, applications, and contact CTA. Closes via dialog state passed from parent.
Provides search input and category dropdown for filtering services. Uses UI components and controlled input state.
frontend/src/config/branding.ts: Centralized branding config defining logos, meta-image paths, and company information. Used across layout and SEO components.
frontend/src/content/services.ts: Defines the Service interface and a list of service objects with descriptions, features, applications, categories, and icons. Serves as static content for service-related components.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity authentication using React Query. Recreates and invalidates dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an authentication context using Dfinity AuthClient, exposing identity, login, logout, and login state. Loads stored identities and manages login flow.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file kept for compatibility after removal of backend queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useReducedMotion.ts: Hook that tracks the user's prefers-reduced-motion setting via a media query.
frontend/src/hooks/useSeo.ts: Hook that updates document title and various meta tags for SEO and social sharing.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining global styles, color variables, dark mode, utilities, and component styles including slideshow classes.
frontend/src/main.static.tsx: Static build entry using React Query and rendering the App component with default query options.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Main entry point that wraps the App with InternetIdentityProvider and React Query client.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: About page with company overview, capabilities list, and SEO metadata setup.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact page providing contact details, a form, and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage featuring hero section with typing animation, services overview, carousel, and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/SolutionsPage.tsx: Solutions page offering searchable and filterable service listings with detail panels and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and container settings using plugins and CSS variables.
project_state.json: Tracks the projectâ€™s current state, requirements, known issues, and image updates for converting the ICP app into a static React/Vite site.
